page.title: 04BRITISH AEROSPACE (CONT)
page.content: The Division has a medical centre and dental surgery for its employees. There is a Sports and Social Club which provides various sporting facilities. The military aircraft are bought by airforces in 26 countries. The value of exports since 1951 totals some Â£2.8 billion to date. The cost of British Aerospace's latest aircraft, Tornado, is Â£13.2 million. The Division is the only company in Great Britain to have built supersonic aircraft in quantity, more than 1000 of which have been delivered.
